body:
Thanks for the feedback! If your issue is related to the Flutter framework itself,
please open an issue at
[github.com/flutter/flutter](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/new).

## What happened

(please describe what you were doing when this exception occurred)

## Version information

Android Studio `3.4` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 35.1.1` • Dart plugin `183.6270`

Flutter 1.2.1 • channel stable • https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git
Framework • revision 8661d8aecd (3 months ago) • 2019-02-14 19:19:53 -0800
Engine • revision 3757390fa4
Tools • Dart 2.1.2 (build 2.1.2-dev.0.0 0a7dcf17eb)

## Exception

null

```

	at com.intellij.openapi.editor.impl.LineSet.findLineIndex(LineSet.java:172)

	at io.flutter.editor.WidgetIndentsHighlightingPassFactory.lambda$null$1(WidgetIndentsHighlightingPassFactory.java:196)
	at com.intellij.openapi.application.TransactionGuardImpl$2.run(TransactionGuardImpl.java:315)
	at com.intellij.openapi.application.impl.LaterInvocator$FlushQueue.doRun(LaterInvocator.java:435)
```

comment_data.body: Thanks for the report! This should be addressed by the just released M35.2 release.

title: IDE crash report
